import { useAuth0 } from '@auth0/auth0-react'; import { useContext, useEffect, useReducer, useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Col, Container, Form, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaKey } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { loginAction } from '../../store/actions/auth.action'; import { AuthDispatchContext, OAuth2Context } from '../../store/contexts/auth.context'; const Login = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const {loginWithPopup, isAuthenticated} = useContext(OAuth2Context); const dispatch = useContext(AuthDispatchContext); const [userEmail, setUserEmail] = useState(''); const [userPassword, setUserPassword] = useState(''); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [submit, setSubmit] = useState(false); const handleChangeEmail = (e) => { setUserEmail(e.target.value); } const handleChangePassword = (e) => { setUserPassword(e.target.value); } const loginSubmitForm = (e) => { setSubmit(true); if (!userEmail || !userPassword) { setError('user email or user password is not null'); e.preventDefault(); return; } setError(''); dispatch(loginAction(true)); e.preventDefault(); } useEffect(() => { if (!error && submit) { navigate('/forgot-password'); setSubmit(false); } }, [error]) return (
